ai-iti102:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti102:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
ai-iti102:2.2_0: For one who knows and sees what?
ai-iti102:2.3_0: The ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees suffering.
ai-iti102:2.3_1: This is the origin of suffering.
ai-iti102:2.3_2: This is the cessation of suffering.
ai-iti102:2.3_3: This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
ai-iti102:2.4_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
ai-iti102:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti102:3.4_0: enlightenment follows in the same lifetime.
ai-iti102:5.1_0: This is not for the lazy,
ai-iti102:6.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
